input.sentences: the lowenbrau building had many interesting characters .
the hamburger was take a little too literally here .
the building was lit up beautifully with the decor .
th pink display fit in perfect at the fair .
the swinging ride was lit up beautifully at night .
output.sentences: Starting at the bar probably wasn't the best idea.
I was hungery, and drunker than normal so I stumbled my way down the street to the nearest thing that resemble food; a hamburger pub.
I ate, paid, and continued on my solo walk, to find my self in front a huge light building.
Walking in realized that it was a facade into a carnaval like gather, with bright neon lights and strange decor.
Even the rides were a bit too much for my current state of mind.
